prompt: A photorealistic depiction of General Grievous from Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith, standing amidst the wreckage of a battlefield on Utapau. His (fierce gaze:1.1) is locked on an unseen enemy, conveying both cunning and ruthless determination. (Detailed textures:1.3) are visible on his metallic limbs and the intricate details of his weaponry. His (distinctive cough:1.0) is implied by a slightly open mouth and tense posture.
